Widget.name: HTML
Widget.Description: Link to a JSP file or just enter HTML code to include in your page.

Option.name: HTML code
Option.Description: HTML code to append to the document.

Option.name: JSP file path
Option.Description: You can either include HTML directly in the HTML Code text area, or include a JSP file that must be in the /WEB-INF/jsp directory of your web application. The path is defined including the root of the web application, for example, /WEB-INF/jsp/custom.jsp

Option.name: Disable Widget Tag
Option.Description: Disabling the WidgetTag can be useful if you have some inconsistent HTML code which does not close all its tags

Option.name: Css path
Option.Description: CSS path where the decoration will be appended in the html.

Option.name: Decoration position
Option.Description: The decoration will be appended or prepended.
